dialogues.speaker: Joni
dialogues.message: ...and that's 100! I love exercising! It's GREAT!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Wow Joni, not even the apocalypse can stop you from working out.

dialogues.speaker: Joni
dialogues.message: YUP!! Gotta be in my best shape if I'm gonna survive the crazy times we live in!

dialogues.speaker: Joni
dialogues.message: You been keeping up with your routine?

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Ehh not really, kinda been busy dealing with...

dialogues.speaker: Joni
dialogues.message: OH right! The skeletons!! Well at least you're keeping active!!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: I gotta go deal with the rest of them now. See you, Joni.

dialogues.speaker: Joni
dialogues.message: Bye bye! Keep up the good work, Leon!
